topic: Deep Learning: The Power of Many Layers
lesson_structure: 1. Quick Recap of Neural Networks (5 min)2. What is 'Deep' Learning? (10 min)3. Why Go Deep? Advantages of Deep Learning (15 min)4. Key Deep Learning Architectures (20 min): Deep Feedforward Networks, Convolutional Neural Networks (conceptual), Recurrent Neural Networks (conceptual)5. Real-World Applications & Impact (5 min)6. Brief Challenges & Future Outlook (5 min)7. Summary & Next Steps
